Metadata.title: COFFEE TOWN BAKERY - Bakery Production Tools
Metadata.description: Intelligent tools for bakery production calculation and recipe scaling.

BakeryApp.title: Coffee Town Bakery
BakeryApp.subtitle: Not What You Want, But Surely What You Need
BakeryApp.settingsDescription: Adjust the glass effect for all panels.
BakeryApp.resetUsageSuccess: All historical usage data has been deleted.

ProductionCalculator.noIngredients: No ingredients for the entered quantities.
ProductionCalculator.noDataToSave: Calculate a production first to save the usage summary.
ProductionCalculator.ocrSuccess: Auto-filled {count} items. Press Calculate to see results.

RecipeScaler.title: Recipe Scaler
RecipeScaler.description: Choose a recipe and enter a multiplier to scale the ingredients.
RecipeScaler.prompt: Select a recipe and click 'Scale' to see results.

RecipeManager.title: Recipe Management
RecipeManager.loginRequiredDescription: Please log in to add, edit, or delete recipes.
RecipeManager.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the recipe "{recipeName}".

ProductManager.title: Product Management
ProductManager.loginRequiredDescription: Please log in to add, edit, or delete products.
ProductManager.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the product "{productName}".

InventoryManager.title: Inventory Management
InventoryManager.resetDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all historical daily usage records. This data is used for the Order Recommendation Calculator.
InventoryManager.loginRequiredDescription: Please log in to manage inventory.
InventoryManager.deleteDialogDescription: This will permanently delete the ingredient "{name}".
InventoryManager.orderDialogNoDataDescription: To use the order calculator, go to the Production Calculator tab, enter production quantities, calculate the results, and then "Save as Daily Usage". You need at least one saved record to generate recommendations.

DailyUsageDashboard.title: Historical Usage Dashboard
DailyUsageDashboard.noDataDescription: To view historical data, go to the Production Calculator tab, enter your production quantities, calculate the results, and then click "Save as Daily Usage". Your saved summaries will appear here.

OrderCalculator.recommendationDescription: Based on an average usage of {count} saved records for this day.
OrderCalculator.noRecommendation: No order recommendations at this time based on your current stock and forecast.
OrderCalculator.forecastDayDescription: The calculation will use the average of the last 4 saved usages for the selected day.

IngredientForm.orderUnitDescription: Define a larger unit for easier ordering (e.g., order "1 sak" instead of "25000 g").

PageError.title: Application Error
PageError.message: Could not connect to the database. Please check the following:
PageError.check1: Ensure all 6 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_... variables are correctly set in your .env file.
PageError.check2: Make sure you have created a Firestore Database in your Firebase project and started it in test mode.
PageError.check3: Verify that the Cloud Firestore API is enabled in your Google Cloud console.
